definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be abundant, si Vera l. (as Aram. loan-word; [[עֲתַר]], 9tar, be rich = Heb. [[עָשַׁר]]);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. fpl. [[נַעְתָּרוֹת]] Pr 27:6 (of enemy's kisses; De excessive; opp. [[נֶאֱמָנִים]]); Toy prop. [[נֶעֱקָשׁוֹת]], or [[נַעֲוֹת]], crooked, hypocritical.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 mpl. [[הַעְתַּרְתֶּם עָלַי דִּבְרֵיכֶם]] Ez Eze 35:13 ye have multiplied against me your words (‖[[עָלַי בְּפִיכֶם וַתַּגְדִּילוּ]]), del. as gloss Co after LXX, Toy reads sg., and thinks verb due to Aramaizing scribe.
